definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: The article analyzed the advantages of pricing through quantity bill and the necessity to be carried out.
sentences.chinese: 分析了工程量清单计价法的优势及实施的必要性。

sentences.english: Diamonds are weighed and valued in carats. One carat equals two hundred milligrams .
sentences.chinese: 钻石的称量和计价单位是克拉，一克拉相当二百毫克。

sentences.english: The reading on the meter is fifty-five yuan.
Charters of oil-tankers may be by time or for voyage.
sentences.chinese: 油轮的租赁费可以按时间或航程计价。

sentences.english: The cash equivalent valuation is the product of "asset future benefit".
sentences.chinese: 资产现值计价是资产“未来经济利益观”的产物。

sentences.english: To integrate with the international practice, BOQ should be adopted for valuation in China.
sentences.chinese: 实行工程量清单计价是与国际惯例接轨的要求。

sentences.english: That is especially the case for bonds denominated in local currencies.
sentences.chinese: 对于那些以当地货币计价的债券来说，情况更是如此。

sentences.english: I am not sure , but whatever it is, it will show you on the meter.
sentences.chinese: 我没有把握，但不管是多少，计价器会显示的。

sentences.english: Ending inventory is valued on the basis of prices paid for the units first acquired.
sentences.chinese: 期末存货根据最先购入存货所支付的价格计价。

sentences.english: The cashier checked out the groceries.
sentences.chinese: 收银员将杂货一一计价后收款。

sentences.english: Deceptive forces stratagem's lumber cost changed from 100 to 175.
sentences.chinese: 策略模式疑兵计价格由100木调整为175木。

sentences.english: Crude oil prices on the world market are set in dollars.
sentences.chinese: 国际市场原油价格都是以美金计价的。

sentences.english: Eddy: I use the meter. Where would you like to go?
sentences.chinese: 我使用计价表。你想去哪里？

sentences.english: You can read the kilometer on the meter.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在计价器上看到公里数。

definition: local currency/our own currency/abbr. for 本位貨幣|本位货币
norm/standard/standard of reference/base/base point/base line/benchmark/reference point/reference frame/criterion/data
to raise or lower the price/price adjustment
to settle a bill/to close an account
special drawing rights (SDR), international currency of the IMF
